Red Bank Borough Public Schools / Homepage

a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

div.p: Dream BIG ... We'll help you get there!

span.a: BOE Mtg: 7 pm Exec/7:30 pm Public Budget Hearing
BOE Mtg: 7 pm Exec/7:30 pm Public

div.p: For the third year in a row the Red Bank Borough Public Schools earn the Certificate of Excellence in Financial Reporting. A real tribute to our commitment to transparency as we support our journey to be the best school district in America so we can be certain we are the best for Red Bank!

a.title: Go to comments for 3 in a Row: 2017, 2018, 2019!

div.p: In 2014-15 the adults of our school community started to talk about the BIA mindset and attitude - Best In America. We embraced the idea of putting our best foot forward at all times for our students, their families and our community. Five years later, the BIA mindset is alive and well because what started with the adults has been reciprocated by our students. A great example of this is the recent achievements of our athletic teams, especially our Lady Rockets basketball team. They put their best foot forward on the court, in the classroom, in our hallways, and in our community.

a.title: Go to comments for Hoops...We Did It Again!

div.p: The Red Bank Borough Public Schools are dedicated to providing a well-rounded educational experience for our children. Thanks to strong community partnerships we enhance our high-quality instructional programming with a variety of extra-curricular activities to assist students in finding their passion. Our special programs include Debate, Dance, Strings, Concert Band, Rock Ensemble, a full menu of Athletic opportunities and more.

a.title: Go to comments for Expanding a Special Community Partnership

img.alt: A High Performing School District with Exemplary Educators

a.span: A High Performing School District with Exemplary Educators

div.p: The #RBBisBIA (Best In America) mindset continues to drive our culture and influence the educational journey of our students. We continue to demonstrate significant growth through a deliberate approach to servicing all students of our community. Check out our recent accomplishments. Might a Blue Ribbon be next?!?!

a.title: Go to comments for A High Performing School District with Exemplary Educators

div.p: Red Bank Middle School's annual Spelling Bee is always a a fun event - it's also intense! This year's participants were calm, cool, and collected. It was fun to see our students exhibit such composure under pressure on the big stage and in front of a large audience. It was even better to see the support they gave to each other.

a.title: Go to comments for Spelling Bee a Huge S-U-C-C-E-S-S
